alert.note: Alert for Central Phoenix; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 10:46AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1115 AM MST... At 1046 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chandler Heights, or 8 miles east of Sun Lakes, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Sun Lakes, East Mesa, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, South Phoenix, San Tan Village Mall, Seville, Freestone Park, Bapchule, Fiesta Mall, Olberg, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport and San Tan Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 151 and 182. US Highway 60 between mile markers 173 and 189. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 147 and 186. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Phoenix; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
